dimensions.label: Risk Taker
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will boldly take risks and face obstacles head-on, driven by a sense of urgency.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the pros and cons before taking calculated risks, prioritizing prudence over expediency.

dimensions.label: Problem Solver
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will methodically analyze data and break down complex issues into manageable parts, seeking objective solutions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to navigate challenges, trusting their gut feelings over rational analysis.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through hands-on experience and direct application, seeking to put knowledge into practice.
Your FarTwin will engage in abstract thinking and analysis, preferring to understand concepts before applying them practically.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assertively express their opinions and defend their position, even if it means clashing with others.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground and work to find mutually beneficial solutions, prioritizing harmony over individual interests.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and enthusiastically display their emotions, embracing their feelings and sharing them with others.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private and reserved, only revealing them to those they trust or when it's necessary for the situation.

dimensions.label: Creativity Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative endeavors?

options.description: Your FarTwin will act on spontaneous ideas and inspirations, allowing creativity to flow freely without overthinking.
Your FarTwin will carefully consider their thoughts and feelings before acting, weighing the potential outcomes of creative decisions.

dimensions.label: Relationship Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach social connections?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out social interactions and build extensive networks, valuing the energy of being around others.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key settings, recharging their energy by spending time alone or with a few close friends.

dimensions.label: Personal Growth Focus
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach personal development?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on self-improvement by identifying areas for improvement and striving to overcome their weaknesses.
Your FarTwin will cultivate a deep understanding of themselves, acknowledging their strengths and accepting their limitations with equanimity.
